headline: Targa Resources Corp. Declares Increase to Quarterly Common Dividend and Announces Timing of First Quarter 2025 Earnings Webcast
summary: HOUSTON, April 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Targa Resources Corp. (NYSE: TRGP) ("Targa" or the "Company") announced today that its board of directors has declared an increase to its quarterly cash dividend to $1.00 per common share, or $4.00 per common share on an annualized basis, for the first quarter of 2025, consistent with previously disclosed expectations. This dividend represents a 33 percent increase over the common dividend declared with respect to the first quarter of 2024. This cash d

headline: Strength Seen in Targa Resources (TRGP): Can Its 8.2% Jump Turn into More Strength?
summary: Targa Resources (TRGP) saw its shares surge in the last session with trading volume being higher than average. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions could translate into further price increase in the near term.
